channel.title: OLake Search Results
channel.description: Search results for OLake documentation, blog posts, and technical resources

item.title: What makes OLake fast? - Performance optimization strategies
item.description: Learn about OLake's performance optimization strategies including adaptive chunking, parallelized execution, CDC techniques, and MongoDB split vector strategy for high-throughput data replication.

item.title: OLake Architecture Deep Dive - System architecture and scalability
item.description: Comprehensive guide to OLake's system architecture, component interactions, scalability patterns, microservices architecture, and event-driven processing for enterprise deployment.

item.title: MongoDB CDC using Debezium and Kafka - Implementation challenges
item.description: Learn about traditional CDC implementation challenges with Debezium architecture, Kafka Connect, MongoDB oplog, and real-time streaming solutions.

item.title: Problems with Debezium and How we (OLake) solve it
item.description: Compare Debezium limitations with OLake's superior approach, single-component architecture, simplified deployment, and performance benchmarks for CDC solutions.

item.title: How to set up PostgreSQL CDC on AWS RDS
item.description: Complete guide to PostgreSQL CDC implementation on AWS managed services including RDS logical replication, WAL configuration, and security setup.

item.title: MongoDB Connector - Complete integration guide
item.description: Complete MongoDB integration guide with configuration, setup options, CDC setup, benchmarks, and troubleshooting for local MongoDB, MongoDB Atlas, and self-hosted clusters.

item.title: PostgreSQL Connector - Database integration and CDC
item.description: PostgreSQL integration and CDC implementation guide with database connection, CDC parameters, setup options for local PostgreSQL, AWS RDS, Aurora, and GCP Cloud SQL.

item.title: Getting Started - Quick start guide
item.description: Rapid onboarding guide for new users including installation, basic configuration, first data replication, and step-by-step setup with sample configurations.

item.title: Apache Iceberg vs Delta Lake Guide
item.description: Comprehensive comparison of data lakehouse table formats including ACID properties, schema evolution, performance characteristics, and ecosystem support for technology selection.

item.title: Data Lake vs Delta Lake - Architecture comparison
item.description: Data lake vs data lakehouse architecture comparison covering data lake limitations, ACID transactions, schema management, query performance, and migration strategy.
